definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

sentences.english: Wen said parliamentary exchanges are a vital part of Japan-China ties.
sentences.chinese: 溫家寶表示，議會交流是中日關係的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Both sides mainly exchanged in-depth opinions on China-Japan relations.
sentences.chinese: 雙方着重就中日關係問題深入交換了意見。

sentences.english: At present, Sino-Japanese economic ties are not heating up along with cold political ties.
sentences.chinese: 當今中日關係的現狀是“政溫經不熱”。

sentences.english: Abe's resignation will have little impact on Sino-Japanese relations, Liu said.
sentences.chinese: 劉江勇認爲，安倍的辭職對中日關係的影響微乎其微。

sentences.english: What progress does China expect to get in China-Japan relations?
sentences.chinese: 中方希望中日關係取得什麼樣的進展？

sentences.english: Yang also took questions form the journalists on China-Japan relations and the Korean Peninsula nuclear issue.
sentences.chinese: 楊潔篪還就中日關係和朝核問題回答了記者提問。

sentences.english: Non-governmental exchanges have always been the driving force of Sino-Japanese relations.
sentences.chinese: 民間交流始終是中日關係發展的推動力。

sentences.english: Tang Jiaxuan expressed his welcome to Nobutaka Machimura for his visit to China at the time when China-Japan relations are falling into a plight.
sentences.chinese: 唐家璇歡迎町村在中日關係出現困難之際訪華。

sentences.english: What will happen to the relationship of CHN &JP?
sentences.chinese: 這對中日關係將帶來什麼啊？

sentences.english: But there is more than that. Jiangsu has a special association with China-Japan relations deeply rooted in history.
sentences.chinese: 特別是，江蘇與中日關係有着深厚的淵源。

sentences.english: China reiterated its positions and propositions concerning the Sino-Japanese relations.
sentences.chinese: 中方重申了對中日關係有關問題的看法和主張。

sentences.english: How will this kind of cultural exchanges help to improve and develop China-Japan relations?
sentences.chinese: 這類文化交流活動對改善和發展中日關係有何幫助？

sentences.english: Historical problems are important factors affecting Sino-Japan relations.
sentences.chinese: 歷史問題一直是影響中日關係的重要因素。

sentences.english: On the China-Japan relationship, both countries have the problem of public opinionguidance.
sentences.chinese: 在中日關係問題上，兩國同樣存在着輿論導向問題。

sentences.english: Since then, China-Japan relations have come a long way.
sentences.chinese: 從那時以來，中日關係在各個領域都取得長足發展。

sentences.english: The upshot is that traditionally strained relations between Japan and China look set for a sharp improvement.
sentences.chinese: 作爲“報李”之舉，過去緊張的中日關係迅速升溫。

definition: Hundred Days Reform (1898), failed attempt to reform the Qing dynasty
Yuan T. Lee (1936-), Taiwanese-born Chemist and Nobel Prize winner in 1986
North and South Korea/bilateral Korean relations
Taichung or Taizhong county in central Taiwan
principle of people's livelihood, the third of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning redistribution of wealth, self-sufficiency and internal trade)
